alert.note: Alert for Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 01 at 9:07PM AKDT until April 02 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting to 35 mph. Visibility one half mile or less. * WHERE...Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility in blowing snow will drop late tonight as winds turn northwest and increase again. Those conditions will improve late Sunday morning as winds decrease.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
